data.prayer: Lord, there are 23,981 people in the state of Kavadartsi who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kavadartsi, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Kavadartsi unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Kavadartsi, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kavadartsi, North Macedonia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kavadartsi, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Kavadartsi.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 65 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, let the threatened of Kavadartsi, North Macedonia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
